Package com.salesforce.multicloudj.dbbackuprestore.driver

Class AbstractDBBackupRestore

java.lang.Object
com.salesforce.multicloudj.dbbackuprestore.driver.AbstractDBBackupRestore
All Implemented Interfaces:
Provider, AutoCloseable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AliDBBackupRestore, AwsDBBackupRestore, FSDBBackupRestore
public abstract class AbstractDBBackupRestore extends Object implements Provider, AutoCloseable
Base class for database backup and restore implementations. This abstract class provides the contract for backup and restore operations across different cloud providers.
Since:
0.2.25
